title: More African nations focus on HPV vaccination against cervical cancer, but hesitancy remains
Xi, Putin score wins as more Asia leaders aim to join BRICS
content: Thailand, a US treaty ally, recently announced its intention to join BRICS, a group consisting of Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa. For countries in Southeast Asia, joining BRICS is seen as a strategy to balance the economic risks from US-China competition. While these nations rely on trade with China, they also value the security and investment provided by the US. Additionally, BRICS membership signals growing frustration with the US-led international order and institutions dominated by Western powers, such as the World Bank and the IMF.
summary: Thailand, a US treaty ally, recently announced its intention to join BRICS, a group consisting of Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa. For countries in Southeast Asia, joining BRICS is seen as a strategy to balance the economic risks from US-China competition. While these nations rely on trade with China, they also value the security and investment provided by the US. Additionally, BRICS membership signals growing frustration with the US-led international order and institutions dominated by Western powers, such as the World Bank and the IMF.

title: 'Joyous William vs gloomy Harry': Fans draw sharp contrasts between the two royals' concert experiences
content: Prince William's enthusiastic presence at Taylor Swift's concert, along with his children, sparks discussions on social media about the royal brothers' contrasting concert experiences. The event, attended by notable figures like Labour party leader Keir Starmer, showcases the significant economic impact of Swift's tour on London, adding another chapter to the ongoing analysis of the royal family's public personas.
summary: Prince William's enthusiastic presence at Taylor Swift's concert, along with his children, sparks discussions on social media about the royal brothers' contrasting concert experiences. The event, attended by notable figures like Labour party leader Keir Starmer, showcases the significant economic impact of Swift's tour on London, adding another chapter to the ongoing analysis of the royal family's public personas.

title: Arkansas nurse dies helping mass shooting victim

'What are the odds': Space debris crashes into Florida home; here's what the family did next
content: Alejandro Otero and his family in Naples, Florida, file an $80,000 lawsuit against Nasa for damages caused by space debris crashing into their home. The lawsuit, represented by attorney Mica Nguyen Worthy, aims to set a precedent for space debris claims. The family seeks compensation for various damages and emphasizes the potential catastrophic consequences of the incident.
summary: Alejandro Otero and his family in Naples, Florida, file an $80,000 lawsuit against Nasa for damages caused by space debris crashing into their home. The lawsuit, represented by attorney Mica Nguyen Worthy, aims to set a precedent for space debris claims. The family seeks compensation for various damages and emphasizes the potential catastrophic consequences of the incident.

title: US mass shooting: 10 injured in early morning attack in Columbus ,Ohio
content: An early morning shooting in Columbus, Ohio's Short North Arts District on Sunday left 10 people injured, with one in critical condition. The incident occurred around 2.30 am. Columbus police found six people with gunshot wounds at the scene and later learned that four more had been taken to hospitals.
summary: An early morning shooting in Columbus, Ohio's Short North Arts District on Sunday left 10 people injured, with one in critical condition. The incident occurred around 2.30 am. Columbus police found six people with gunshot wounds at the scene and later learned that four more had been taken to hospitals.

title: Taxing the super-rich? 74% of Indians support it – Here’s why
Nasa overlooked minor leak in Boeing starliner pre-launch, leaving astronauts stranded at ISS: Report
content: Nasa and Boeing face challenges with the Starliner rocket launch due to helium leaks affecting safety and delaying astronaut return. Boeing was criticised for safety concerns and cost overruns in the project. The delayed return of the Starliner may impact space station spacewalks and raise concerns about Boeing's ability to address issues.
summary: Nasa and Boeing face challenges with the Starliner rocket launch due to helium leaks affecting safety and delaying astronaut return. Boeing was criticised for safety concerns and cost overruns in the project. The delayed return of the Starliner may impact space station spacewalks and raise concerns about Boeing's ability to address issues.

title: Aerial drone launched by Yemen's Houthi rebels hits ship in the Red Sea, causing damage and injuries
Where is Melania Trump? Former first lady's elusive presence on US 2024 campaign trail sparks curiosity
content: Former First Lady Melania Trump's absence from key events in her husband's 2024 campaign has sparked media speculation. Her minimal public appearances and absence during Donald Trump's hush money trial have raised questions about her role. Historian Katherine Jellison noted Melania's unconventional approach, contrasting her with other political spouses.
summary: Former First Lady Melania Trump's absence from key events in her husband's 2024 campaign has sparked media speculation. Her minimal public appearances and absence during Donald Trump's hush money trial have raised questions about her role. Historian Katherine Jellison noted Melania's unconventional approach, contrasting her with other political spouses.
